title: KPMG and Aiimi to launch workplace AI tool
description: Aiimi’s consultants and workplace AI platform will focus on integrating, classifying, and optimising KPMG’s data estate.
content:
KPMG has announced a partnership with UK company Aiimi to launch a workplace AI platform for data governance across its operations.
The collaboration is designed to manage sensitive information and … [+2380 chars]
